referencedBy.comment: BusinessStepID is a vocabulary whose elements denote steps in business processes. An example is an identifier that denotes “shipping.” The business step field of an event specifies the business context of an event: what business process step was taking place that caused the event to be captured? This specification has chosena 5 of the 41 possible bizstep values defined by GS1 that are appropriate for the sustainbility use case.
